OOC:  Err, Rauq, you didn t say anything about me in your post.  I m a good
boy.    No, I m not!  But, I am special, that s for sure.  Oh, there I go
being

OOC:  Err, Rauq, you didn't say anything about me in your post.  I'm a good=

boy.    No, I'm not!  But, I am special, that's for sure.  Oh, there I go
=
being boastful again.  Hey, at least I'm not modest to the point of near
su=
icide now!

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 05, 2002 11:20:42 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: people...

OOC: Stay out of my business. What is your business here, Rauq? You're the=

head moderator? I've been here longer than you have, and have contributed
=
far more only to be put down time after time. You're a rookie compared to m=
e
 too, Rauq. If you smell what the Rauq is cooking.

It's not my fault Cardhead is such a bad RPer, is it?...

----- Original Message -----
From: x_rauq_x
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 10:42 PM
Subject: ooC: people...


I've been lurking around for those wondering. Megatron is waiting in=20
the control room for the Predacons, most of which are 'busy' or=20
something. I really don't have much to post about right now, but I=20
still have to read the posts up till when i last checked em.

I guess i have to stick my nose in, cause this obviously aint=20
getting better, it's getting worse. *raises verbal shields*

First think that needs to happen is a cease fire in this flame war=20
between cardhead, lurker, and narrator. it started wrong right from=20
the start. certain things which shouldn't have been said, were said,=20
and the replies were less than sucessful at defusing the situation=20
and it blew up.=20

cardhead, if you don't like Narrator's posting style, that's your=20
problem. Telling him that you don't like it, with a bunch of=20
senseless slander isn't going to make him post the way you'd like=20
him to post.

Narrator, keep ooc comments out of your posting, if you want to say=20
something, say it and no pot shots. And I find it really hard to=20
believe that you managed to put 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up' in=20
the same context.

If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up about this=20
stupid arguement, and get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can=20
say now short of an appologies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me=20
that anyone is growing up.

*preps for backlash*

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> BULL-FUCKING-SHIT YOU HAVE.  I'm 20 - I've been into Transformers=20
as=20
> long as anyone else who would have even the remotest interest in=20
this=20
> RPG.
>=20
> And take that "Rookie" comment and stick it somewhere painful. =20
I've=20
> been roleplaying my WHOLE DAMN LIFE.
>=20
> You got a problem with that, TOUGH LUCK.
>=20
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Hollywood Narrator Countdown" <thecode@p...>=20
> wrote:
> > OOC: Hey, you, you piece of dog shit. You can kiss my ass and=20
grow=20
> up. I didn't ask for your opinion ROOKIE. I've been here for since=20
> you were in diapers...


=20

Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/=
=20




Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
ADVERTISEMENT



Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
